timeline.message: adding in table and data requests

timeline.bodyText: Why are you passing in the logger?  I don't think I have seen that before.
timeline.author: kellykelly3

replies.bodyText: This was done for testing purposes.  If the java.util.logging.Logger is used, we can create a mock or bare bones logger for unit testing purposes without having to load up the netbeans platform.
replies.author: gdicristofaro

timeline.bodyText: There is a warning about dereferencing a null pointer.
timeline.author: kellykelly3

replies.bodyText: I think the StringUtils.isBlank checks on the original variable and the translated variable prevent either of these from being null.
replies.author: gdicristofaro

timeline.bodyText: This would be very difficult to debug if there was an issue.  You might want to consider revising.
timeline.author: kellykelly3

replies.bodyText: Ok.  I'll break it up a little bit.
replies.author: gdicristofaro

timeline.bodyText: I have already fixed this in my PR, might want to remove this so there is no conflicts.
timeline.author: kellykelly3
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -45,7 +45,7 @@
     private final List<Pair<String, BaseDataSourceSummaryPanel>> tabs = Arrays.asList(
             Pair.of(Bundle.DataSourceSummaryTabbedPane_detailsTab_title(), new DataSourceSummaryDetailsPanel()),
             Pair.of(Bundle.DataSourceSummaryTabbedPane_countsTab_title(), new DataSourceSummaryCountsPanel()),
-            Pair.of(Bundle.DataSourceSummaryTabbedPane_detailsTab_title(), new DataSourceSummaryUserActivityPanel())
+            Pair.of(Bundle.DataSourceSummaryTabbedPane_userActivityTab_title(), new DataSourceSummaryUserActivityPanel())

replies.bodyText: I just checked and I think if nothing else, the comma will cause a conflict.  I don't know if I'm entirely accurate on this, but I think if I revert my code, it will still be a conflict with the revert.  I think it might make sense to deal with the conflict when it happens.  If I go second, I'll pull and handle the merge conflict.
replies.author: gdicristofaro

replies.bodyText: I wasn't suggesting reverting it, just change it back, but what ever you want to do.
replies.author: kellykelly3

timeline.message: updates to include call log and emails in accounts
